Full crude oil assay in minutes
The fastest crude oil quality analyser for refineries, powered by AI and low-field NMR technology

PRODUCT OVERVIEW

Bibendum amet at molestie mattis.

The Rombo AI Analyzer is a cutting-edge solution designed to transform spectral analysis through the power of artificial intelligence. Integrating state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms with robust spectral analysis techniques, this platform offers unparalleled accuracy, efficiency, and depth of insight across a broad spectrum of applications. From pharmaceuticals to environmental monitoring, the Rombo AI Analyzer is equipped to handle complex data analysis, ensuring precision and reliability in every result.

All-In-One Crude Oil Analysis Suite

Reduced Hardware and Maintenance Costs: Consolidates multiple testing apparatuses into a single, efficient unit, significantly cutting down on equipment expenses and maintenance needs.

Data-Driven Insights: AI integration provides deeper analytical capabilities, enhancing predictive maintenance and operational strategy.

Enhanced Operational Efficiency: Streamlines the analysis process, allowing for quicker decision-making and improved workflow. One single device for all quality and property estimation needs.

Full Crude Oil Assay Analysis

Leverages the combined power of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to accurately estimate over 40 different properties of crude oil , including but not limited to density, viscosity, sulfur content, and more.

ASTM/ISO Accuracy:
 Adheres to stringent American Society for Testing and Materials (ASTM) and International Organization for Standardization (ISO) accuracy standards, ensuring high-quality, reliable results.

Reliability and Accuracy of Conventional Analyzers:reamlined customer service:
 Matches or exceeds the performance of traditional crude oil analysis equipment in terms of reliability and accuracy, providing confidence in the results.

Streamlined Analysis Process:
 Reduces the need for multiple tests and equipment, leading to a more efficient workflow.

Data-Driven Decision Making:
 Empowers operators with precise, comprehensive data for better decision-making in processing and refining operations.

Fully Automatic Measurement

Feature explanation: reduce the manual intervention of specialised personnel Benefit explanation:

  • Daily laboratory tasks reduced (90% of reduction on components analysis)
  • ASTM is standard has 2% accuracy, but exposing analysis to humans is error-prone

The process:

  1. An operator compose the sample by mixing the crude oil with a reference chemical.
  2. The acquisition is started via the GUI.
  3. The Acquisition is elaborated via AI Algorithms.
  4. The crude oil Assay is generated.
Express Quality Analysis

Feature: Perform crude oil analysis/ get full report in minutes

Benefit: Streamline crude oil management by compressing idle times and removing bottlenecks

Explanation:
 2 months 15 minutes

  1. An operator compose the sample by mixing the crude oil with a reference chemical.
  2. The acquisition is started via the GUI.
  3. The Acquisition is elaborated via AI Algorithms.
  4. The crude oil Assay is generated.
